```{r}
#| label: included-reports

library(tidyverse)

report_data <- readRDS("data/transformed-paragraphs.Rds")

report_data$report_namePKO %>%
    unique() %>%
    print()

report_data$report_namePKO %>%
    unique() %>%
    length() %>%
    paste("There are", . , "reports in total") %>%
    print()

report_data %>%
    select(report_namePKO, numberParagraphs, paragraphRelevant) %>%
    distinct()

```
